downloadTitle: Microsoft Billing SBE 3.0 Management Pack for MOM 2005
downloadDescription: Microsoft Billing SBE 3.0 Management Pack monitors Billing SBE 3.0 services and their availability.
detailsSection:
Microsoft Billing Standard Business Event (SBE) 3.0 Management Pack for MOM monitors the Billing SBE 3.0 services application event log. This management pack is build for monitoring both Billing SBE 3.0 Web and Windows services generated events. It includes event rules for the Batched Delivery windows service and Billing SBE Runtime web service. The events collected from each individual service indicate critical issues, informational events and error events generated during various Billing SBE 3.0 configurations and process flows. In addition different monitoring and corrective tasks allows detection and curing of service outages.

Feature Summary:

Billing SBE 3.0 services generated Error and Informational events.
Billing SBE 3.0 service monitoring events indicating services health status.
Alerts indicating configuration issues for services
State monitoring view for various component services health status
Tasks to facilitate monitoring and control Billing SBE 3.0 services
Notification if windows services outrage

Release and Update History:

9/19/2006 Original product release date (Version 03.0.0000.0000)
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Windows Server™ 2003 Enterprise Edition Service Pack 1 (SP1)
